subpanels.description: Immature tubarium of Gothograptus auriculatus n. sp., obverse view, showing the first three thecae. The tubarium is from the Bartoszyce IG-1 core, depth 1645.2 m, praedeubeli Biozone.

Mature tubarium of Gothograptus auriculatus n. sp., obverse view, with wide lists above the proximal lateral orifice (dark blue). The tubarium is from the Bartoszyce IG-1 core, depth 1645.2 m, praedeubeli Biozone.
Inside view of the proximal end of Gothograptus nassa (Holm, 1890), showing the sicula rim. The specimen is from Mulde Marl, Blåhäll, Gotland, Sweden Locality 813-832, Blåhäll 1.
Outside view of the ancora of Gothograptus nassa (Holm, 1890), shown as a stereopair.
Outside view of the ancora of Gothograptus nassa (Holm, 1890), shown as a stereopair.
Stereopair of the ventral view of the proximal end of Gothograptus nassa (Holm, 1890).
Lateral view of Gothograptus nassa (Holm, 1890), showing the colored reticulated wall of the metasicula.
Outside view of the proximal end of Gothograptus kozlowskii Kozłowska-Dawidziuk, 1990, with outer ancora. The specimen is from an erratic boulder, Jarosławiec 147, Poland, lundgreni Biozone.
